title: The Princess Diaries
creator_credit: Bottom of the Ninth Productions, Walt Disney Pictures, BrownHouse Productions, Mayne Berke, Garry Marshall, Whitney Houston, Mario Iscovich, Debra Martin Chase and Gina Wendkos
brief_description: A socially awkward but very bright 15-year-old girl being raised by a single mom discovers that she is the princess of a small European country because of the recent death of her long-absent father, who, unknown to her, was the crown prince of Genovia. She must make a choice between continuing the life of a San Francisco teen or stepping up to the throne.

constellations_other.name: Princesses, rom-coms and sit-coms
constellations_other.description: Newsreel footage was captured on large, bulky 35mm cameras like the Mitchell Newsreel Camera by operators in the field, but they were also used by film production companies and on TV shows, with some of those involved going on to define different genres.
